name: Volcano God
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 49. (15-MINUTE PLAYTIME)

Make offerings to the angry Volcano God to protect your village from an eruption!

  • WASD to move
  • Move MOUSE to balance offerings
  • Watch out for wind, geysers, and fireballs
  • Deposit all 3 offerings to save the village

Thanks to Ludum Dare hosts!
